heading: HR00817
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CALL FOR THE IMMEDIATE REVIEW OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11223, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE ACT", PARTICULARLY, ON THE INCREASE AND MANDATORY PAYMENT OF PREMIUM CONTRIBUTIONS IMPOSED UPON OVERSEAS FILIPINO MEMBERS AND TO SUSPEND THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE RELEVANT PROVISIONS OF R.A. 11223 AND ITS PERTINENT RULES AND REGULATIONS AS ISSUED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND PHILIPPINE HEALTH INSURANCE CORPORATION
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00817
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CALL FOR THE IMMEDIATE REVIEW OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11223, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE ACT", PARTICULARLY, ON THE INCREASE AND MANDATORY PAYMENT OF PREMIUM CONTRIBUTIONS IMPOSED UPON OVERSEAS FILIPINO MEMBERS AND TO SUSPEND THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE RELEVANT PROVISIONS OF R.A. 11223 AND ITS PERTINENT RULES AND REGULATIONS AS ISSUED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND PHILIPPINE HEALTH INSURANCE CORPORATION
